articles.description: Jude Bellingham's remarkable rise continued as he netted England's winner in their Euro 2024 opener against Serbia.
articles.title: Jude Bellingham: England's Euro 2024 star 'who writes his own scripts'

articles.description: American Bryson DeChambeau wins his second US Open title after Rory McIlroy collapses with three bogeys in final four holes.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Bryson DeChambeau beats Rory McIlroy for second major

articles.description: France striker Kylian Mbappe says his new club Real Madrid would not let him play at the Olympics in Paris this summer.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Austria v France preview

articles.description: Erik ten Hag says Manchester United visited him while on holiday in Ibiza and asked him to stay as manager.
articles.title: Erik ten Hag: Manchester United showed up on my doorstep to ask me to stay

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Serbia vs England in the UEFA Euro 2024
articles.title: Serbia vs England LIVE: Euro 2024 Score, predictions line-ups and updates

articles.description: Bangladesh reach the Super 8s stage of the T20 World Cup after beating Nepal by 21 runs in St Vincent.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: Bangladesh beat Nepal to reach Super 8s

articles.description: Katie Boulter retains the Nottingham Open title after coming from a set down to beat Karolina Pliskova.
articles.title: Nottingham Open: Katie Boulter beats Karolina Pliskova and Emma Raducanu to retain title

articles.description: To even be at Euro 2024 is an achievement for Christian Eriksen - but to score Denmark's opening goal of the tournament after suffering a cardiac arrest is simply special.
articles.title: Euro 2024: 'Different story' for Denmark's Christian Eriksen after goalscoring Euros return

articles.description: Andy Murray says he would prefer to retire at Wimbledon or the Paris Olympics as his tennis career draws towards an end.
articles.title: Andy Murray: Retiring at Wimbledon or Paris 2024 Olympics would be fitting

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Poland vs Netherlands in the UEFA Euro 2024
articles.title: Poland 1-2 Netherlands: Wout Weghorst scores winner for Dutch in Euro 2024 Group D
